solution_line_template: The chocolate bars had a total of {chocolate_bars_count} * {sugar_per_bar} = <<{chocolate_bars_count}*{sugar_per_bar}={total_sugar_chocolate_bars}>>{total_sugar_chocolate_bars} grams of sugar.

There was a total of {total_sugar_chocolate_bars} + {sugar_lollipop} = <<{total_sugar_chocolate_bars}+{sugar_lollipop}={total_sugar_all_candy}>>{total_sugar_all_candy} grams of sugar in all the candy she bought.
